about_the_game:
Dungeon and Monsters Spark of Fate is a dungeon crawler game that takes place in a dark monster-infested labyrinth. Your goal is to escape from this vile place where you were imprisoned and find your way out using the few resources you find along the way.

- 100% hand-drawn
- Labyrinth created by a true Dungeon master (20+ years of experience)
- Dozens of different monsters
- Secret passages
- Miscellaneous items
- Evil bosses
- Multiple endings

name: D&M: Dungeon and Monsters Spark of Fate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
